column2: Virtual Citytour w/ ESN

column6: Let’s learn something about our wonderful city, its ancient history and its monuments, through an online guided tour. We’re going to show you the main attractions using Zoom and Google Maps platforms. You’ll also discover some fun facts and anecdotes about the city, as well as interesting info about our local culture!
column8:
Date: 
17/09/2020 - 21:00
Address: 
Italy
  • Everyone is invited.
